description:
.Net wrapper library for Xero API
v1.0.0.0 - initial version
v1.0.0.1 - Updated to allow PDFs of invoices to be downloaded
v1.0.0.2 - add models for receipt/users/attachmetns
v1.0.0.3 - Update to build in .net 3.5 client profile
v1.0.0.4 fixed the 'get item by id' problem no generating url correctly
v1.0.0.5 fixed the FindById method trying to deserialise correctly and tidied up the serialised xml to be sent to the Xero API
v1.0.0.6 Enable validation warnings/errors to be de-serialised into the model
v1.0.0.7 Enables getting of dynamic reports
v1.0.0.8 Add Single and SingleOrDefault methods; Fix AgedPayableByContact report definition
v1.1.0.0 Introduce TokenRepository and allow for auto-refreshing of access tokens
v1.1.0.3 Fix If-Modified-Since bugs
title: .Net wrapper library for Xero API
